GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.16.13
GSD.description:
bpf, sockmap: Do not ignore orig_len parameter

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.13 by commit 518f8a21ce73755254165729ce3272f8504a69b7, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit ef5659280eb13e8ac31c296f58cfdfa1684ac06b. For more details please see the references link.
